html: This week, three U.S. Reps - @RepDWStweets, @RepShalala, & @RepDMP - were denied access to a federally-funded facility housing migrant children. They were turned away and told to schedule a visit *two weeks* in advance. That’s not how oversight works.https://politi.co/2KsLJfN
text:

html: 50 lives were taken in Christchurch and 5 days later, New Zealand took action. 58 lives were taken in Las Vegas. 49 in Orlando. 27 in Sandy Hook. 12 in Aurora. 13 in Columbine. Thoughts and prayers aren't enough. That’s why the House passed #HR8. Now, the Senate must take action
text:
50 lives were taken in Christchurch and 5 days later, New Zealand took action.
58 lives were taken in Las Vegas.
49 in Orlando.
27 in Sandy Hook.
12 in Aurora.
13 in Columbine.

Thoughts and prayers aren't enough. That’s why the House passed #HR8. Now, the Senate must take action

html: We did it! I joined 233 of my colleagues today to pass sweeping reforms for the government in the For the People Act. -- Protect your right to vote Get dark money out of politics Hold politicians accountable
text:
We did it! I joined 233 of my colleagues today to pass sweeping reforms for the government in the For the People Act. --
    Protect your right to vote
    Get dark money out of politics
    Hold politicians accountable

html: On top of all that, #ForThePeople will ensure greater access to the ballot box, prohibit voter roll purges, and end partisan gerrymandering. (5/6)
text: On top of all that, #ForThePeople will ensure greater access to the ballot box, prohibit voter roll purges, and end partisan gerrymandering. (5/6)

html: And it does so much more: It will bolster ethics laws -- closing loopholes on lobbyists and stopping members of Congress from settling sexual harassment or discrimination cases with taxpayer money. (4/6)
text: And it does so much more: It will bolster ethics laws -- closing loopholes on lobbyists and stopping members of Congress from settling sexual harassment or discrimination cases with taxpayer money. (4/6)

html: #HR1 helps closes that loophole and provides more transparency and accountability in our elections. (3/6)
